I downloaded this so I could view old recorded demos. after a while of fooling around I managed to get console working, but lots of demo's are messed up. Here's a guide to unlock console anyway...

Browse to your install directory. IE: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Counter Strike Source"

Locate the hl2.exe and make a shortcut of it, and place it wherever you want (it will be used to launch the game)

Right click the new shortcut and hit properties. In the "shortcut" tab you'll see the "Target" which shows you: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Counter Strike Source\hl2.exe"

Type at the very end of this " -game cstrike -console " without the ""s. Then it should look something like this: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Counter Strike Source\hl2.exe" -game cstrike -console  (You can also use parameters like "-dxlevel 81" ect, but no point unless you know what you're doing lol.) 

Hit appy/ok and launch the exe, now you have a console, but its recommended that you bind a key to console. Such as when you hit F12, the console appears or disappears. Insert "bind F12 toggleconsole" into console, hit enter and you're all set!
